programme.title: Aankhen
programme.desc: When Vijay Singh Rajput is unceremoniously stripped of his duties as a bank manager, he decides to seek revenge by robbing the bank. To make the robbery untraceable, he trains three blind men to do the job for him.

programme.title: Surkhaab
programme.desc: Jeet, a former judo champion, illegally migrates to Canada from a small town in Punjab to visit her brother Pargat. However, she gets entangled in human trafficking with no way out.

programme.title: Dance Dance
programme.desc: Two siblings Radha (Smita Patil) and Ramu (Mithun Chakraborty) emerge from poverty and become popular performers, that is, until tragedy strikes them. 'Dance Dance' is the journey of Ramu who vows to take revenge against the man who exploited his mother, murdered his father and tortured his sister.

programme.title: Kya Kehna
programme.desc: A young college girl faces hardships and challenges after she becomes a mother without marriage

programme.title: Masti
programme.desc: Three henpecked friends tired of their respective marriage decide to spice up their lives by indulging in an extramarital affair. But things go downhill very quickly when they become the prime suspects in a deadly murder case.

programme.title: Deewaar: Let's Bring Our Heroes Home
programme.desc: A group of Indian POW (Prisoners of War) from the 1971 Indo-Pak war rebels against the Pakistani army and tries to escape from their captivity. Helping the group in the mission is Gaurav, the son of a former Army Major also held captive by the enemy.
